{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Cisco |model=RV220W |asin=B004H8FSQM |est_release_date=01/25/2011 |fcc_date=08/16/2010 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |type=wireless router |fcc_id=P27RV220W |ic_id=5604A-RV220W |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CN5010 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29GL256EHT2I-90Q |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM68B16CWQD-25H |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4322 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53115 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Octal Transparent D-Type Latch;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC373A;;1;,,, Synchronous and Rectified Buck PMW Controller;Chip Advanced Tech;CAT7580;;1;,,, 30V Dual N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AO4842;;1;,,, 600 mA CMOS LDO;AME Inc;AME8809;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=cisco |default_pass=cisco }} {{TagLine|Cisco Wireless Network Security Firewall}}
[http://www.cisco.com/en/US/products/ps11025/index.html Product page]
"YK910A-1.6" and the ''Cisco'' logo is silkscreened on the main board. :"YK900MOA-1.0" is silkscreened on the wireless module.
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31456-cisco-rv220w-wireless-network-security-firewall-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :CPU: [[Cavium]] [http://www.caviumnetworks.com/OCTEON-Plus_CN50XX.html CN5010] @400MHz :Broadcom BCM53115 GbE switch :128MB of RAM and 32MB of flash :Broadcom BCM4322 802.11abgn :2.4/5GHz radio (mini-PCI module)
===See also=== [http://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/routers/small-business-rv-series-routers/models-comparison.html Cisco models comparison]
*[[Cisco RV220W]] Wireless Network Security Firewall :*[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31456-cisco-rv220w-wireless-network-security-firewall-reviewed Review on '''SNB'''] • [http://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/routers/rv220w-wireless-network-security-firewall/index.html PPage] • FCC ID: P27RV220W
*'''[[Cisco RV120W]]''' Wireless-N VPN Firewall :*[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31393-cisco-rv-120w-wireless-n-vpn-firewall-reviewed Review on '''SNB'''] • [http://www.cisco.com/en/US/products/ps10852/index.html PPage] • FCC ID: P27-RV120W :CPU: [[Cavium]] [http://www.caviumnetworks.com/OCTEON-Plus_CN50XX.html CN5010] @300MHz :Broadcom BCM5325 FE switch :64 MB of RAM and 16 MB of flash :Broadcom BCM4322 802.11bgn :2.4GHz radio ([http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31360-new-to-the-charts-cisco-rv-120w-wireless-n-vpn-firewall mini-PCI module])
*'''[[Cisco RV180W]]''' Wireless-N Multifunction VPN Firewall :"YYP00D-1.6" is silkscreened on the main board ([[SerComm]]). :"CK7794V-0" and "YYP00N0B-1.0" is silkscreened on Wi-Fi module. *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/security/security-reviews/31746-cisco-rv180-vpn-router-reviewed ''Cisco RV180'' review on '''SNB'''] • FCC ID: P27-RV180W :This device's board seems to be near-identical ::to the [[Cisco RV180]] (non-wireless model). :The Switch in this model is assumed to be the same. :"YYP00C-1.6" is silkscreened on the RV180 board ([[SerComm]]). :Single ''ESMT'' M14D5121632A-2.5B (64MB) RAM chip ::used despite a place on the board for another.
===Device=== {{#ask: [[Embedded system type::~*]] <q>[[Brand::Cisco]] [[Model::~*RV*]]</q> |?Embedded system type |?Supported 802dot11 protocols |?Manuf |?FCC ID |?CPU1 brand |?CPU1 model |?CPU1 clock speed |?FLA1 amount |?RAM1 amount |?WI1 chip1 brand |?WI1 chip1 model |?WI1 MIMO config |?WI1 802dot11 protocols |?WI2 chip1 brand |?WI2 chip1 model |?WI2 MIMO config |?WI2 802dot11 protocols |?Switch model |?LAN speed |?Expansion IFs |?USB ports |?LAN ports |?WAN ports |?FCC approval date#ISO |?Estimated date of release#ISO |?ASIN |?Wi-Fi certification ID |?WI1 antenna connector |?WI2 antenna connector |?Country of manufacture |?Has images |?WI1 module IF |?WI1 module |?WI2 module IF |?WI2 module |?Third party firmware supported |?Stock bootloader/full |?Stock firmware OS/full |?CPU1 cores |?Switch brand |format=template |introtemplate=Template:ES table intro NC2 |template=Template:ES table entry NC2 |outrotemplate=Template:GenTableOutro |limit=500 |link=all |sort=Page name |headers=show |searchlabel=… further results |class=sortable wikitable smwtable }}
